id.description: The UUID for the `Shift` being retrieved.

$block:
A response to a request to get a `Shift`. The response contains
the requested `Shift` object and might contain a set of `Error` objects if
the request resulted in errors.

$ul: **errors**: Any errors that occurred during the request.
**shift**: A record of the hourly rate, start, and end times for a single work shift
**breaks**: A list of all the paid or unpaid breaks that were taken during this shift.
**created_at**: A read-only timestamp in RFC 3339 format; presented in UTC.
**employee_id**: The ID of the employee this shift belongs to. DEPRECATED at version 2020-08-26. Use `team_member_id` instead.
**end_at**: RFC 3339; shifted to the timezone + offset. Precision up to the minute is
**location_id**: The ID of the location this shift occurred at. The location should be based on
**start_at**: RFC 3339; shifted to the location timezone + offset. Precision up to the
**status**: Describes the working state of the current `Shift`.
**team_member_id**: The ID of the team member this shift belongs to. Replaced `employee_id` at version "2020-08-26".
**timezone**: The read-only convenience value that is calculated from the location based
**updated_at**: A read-only timestamp in RFC 3339 format; presented in UTC.
**version**: Used for resolving concurrency issues. The request fails if the version
**wage**: The hourly wage rate used to compensate an employee for this shift.
**hourly_rate**: Represents an amount of money. `Money` fields can be signed or unsigned.
**amount**: The amount of money, in the smallest denomination of the currency
**currency**: The type of currency, in __ISO 4217 format__. For example, the currency
**title**: The name of the job performed during this shift. Square
